## Description
 &#10;&#9;&#9;Akaganeite is an iron oxide-hydroxide / chloride mineral with&#10;&#9;&#9;formula: Fe3+O e.g.; Î²-FeO. It is formed by the weathering of pyrrhotite. A regolith derived mineral deposit
